name: sportyTourist.com
body:
# sporty tourist

sportyTourist is an effort for the creation of a sports news aggregator that can serve as the vehicle for providing information to people interested in sports and want to travel to to particular destinations where a sporting event or activity is taking place. 
[sportyTourist](http://sportytourist.com)

PARASKEVAS APOSTOLOPOULOS AUG 2016 - TODAY -- ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
